page.title: 14HOPES AND FEARS - 1.
page.content: 1)People were interviewed across the whole of the following age categories: 5-15,16-20,21-30,31-40,41-50,51-65, over 65. 2)The survey included people who had lived in the area for as few as three years,as well as those living there for over 50 years. 3)Of the people who had not lived in the "D Block" area for the whole of their lives most moved to the area from towns and cities rather than from other villages. The following information outlines the questions the people were asked and the three most common responses in each case. {What are your hopes for this area?} a)That village life will remain unspoilt as well as the local environment.In particular no large scale housing developments.
